amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 6 of the bill which would have given either party in a civil case the right to request the reassignment of their case to a different judge without cause.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of April 22, 1998 to strike section 6 of the bill, which would give either party in a civil case the right to request the reassignment of their case to a different judge without providing justification for the reassignment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogan amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
